_comment: Camera 1 Configuration - Standard overhead camera at checkout counter
_notes: HAND_TOUCH_DISTANCE: Distance in pixels for hand touch detection (default: 80)
POSE_CONFIDENCE: Minimum confidence for pose detection (0.0-1.0, default: 0.5)
MIN_TRANSACTION_FRAMES: Minimum consecutive frames to confirm transaction (default: 3)
CALIBRATION_SCALE: Scale factor for pixel to real-world distance conversion
CAMERA_ANGLE: Camera mounting angle in degrees (for future use)
CASHIER_ZONE: [x, y, width, height] to define cashier area, or null for auto-detect
Use setup_cashier_zone.py tool to easily calibrate this zone!
